---
title: "SmartX comparison"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
files <- list.files(here::here("Raw_data/smartx_comparison"), full.names = T)

data1 <- read_csv(files[1:10])
data2 <- read_csv(files[11:20])

data <- data1 %>%
  filter(!is.na(Date)) %>%
  full_join(data2) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Date)) %>%
  mutate(flux.CH4 = as.numeric(flux.CH4))

data %>%
  #filter(flux.CH4<5000) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = flux.CH4)) +
  geom_point()
```
